text: secure psychiatric hospital advisory committee there is hereby established a secure psychiatric hospital advisory committee to assist the commissioner of the department of health and human services and the commissioner of corrections with the planning and construction of a new secure psychiatric hospital as required under a the committee shall be comprised of five members of the house of representatives appointed by the speaker of the house of representatives of whom shall be nominated by the minority leader two members of the senate appointed by the senate president one of whom shall be nominated by the minority leader b members of the committee shall receive mileage at the legislative rate while attending to the duties of the advisory committee the committee shall advise the commissioner of health and human services and the commissioner of corrections on the construction of a secure psychiatric hospital as required under to provide treatment for individuals committed under rsa in an accredited institution the committee also shall advise the commissioners on the transfer of jurisdiction from civil commitment in the secure psychiatric unit to the accredited institution the members of the committee shall elect a chairperson from among the members the first meeting of the committee shall be called by the house member the first meeting of the committee shall be held within days of the effective date of this section four members of the committee shall constitute a quorum the advisory committee shall submit an annual report on november of each year commencing november and a final report on november detailing its activities and findings together with any recommendations for proposed legislation to the president of the senate the speaker of the house of representatives the chairpersons of the house criminal justice and public safety and the house health human services and elderly affairs committees the chairperson of the senate judiciary committee the chairperson of the senate health human services and elderly affairs committee the state library and the governor repeal rsa relative to the secure psychiatric unit facility advisory committee is repealed the remainder of this act shall take effect upon its passage
